body.p: In September 2002 the Board decided to add a short‑term convergence project to its active agenda. The project is being conducted jointly with the United States standard‑setter, the Financial Accounting Standards Board (FASB). The objective of the project is to reduce differences between IFRSs and US generally accepted accounting principles (US GAAP) that are capable of resolution in a relatively short time and can be addressed outside major projects.
